scripts.start:node: node -e "const http=require('http'),fs=require('fs'),path=require('path');http.createServer((req,res)=>{const file=req.url==='/'?'/simple.html':req.url;const filePath=path.join(__dirname,'public',file);fs.readFile(filePath,(err,data)=>{if(err){res.writeHead(404);res.end('Not found');return;}const ext=path.extname(file);const contentType={'html':'text/html','js':'text/javascript','css':'text/css'}[ext.slice(1)]||'text/plain';res.writeHead(200,{'Content-Type':contentType,'Access-Control-Allow-Origin':'*'});res.end(data);})}).listen(3000,()=>console.log('Simple server running on http://localhost:3000'));"
